reporting-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Lithuania

title.narrative: Support to Justice Sector Reform in Moldova, Ukraine and Georgia

description.narrative: The project is intended to impart best practices of Lithuania for Moldova, Ukraine and Georgia in implementing legal sector reform with particular focus on the judicial system, the areas of the Public Prosecutor‘s Office and the fight against corruption aiming at the efficient, transparent, Professional and socially responsible sector compatible with the European standards, safeguarding the law primacy and respect for human rights, and contributing to the achievement of the public trust in the judiciary. This project provided assistance activities will continue to help partner countries in the implementation of objectives of Legal Sector Reform Strategy. Considering the successful cooperation during previous development cooperation and democracy promotion projects, a new partner in the Project involved - the High School of Justice of Georgia. This will enhanced cooperation between the legal representatives of participating countries and will help to provide a possible areas of further cooperation.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Lithuania
